preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 1500 g of the base material and pour it into a mixing container. 
 2. Add 300 g of calcium component to the mixing container. 
 3. Gradually add 450 g of erbium component to the mixture. 
 4. Use a mechanical mixer to ensure homogeneous mixing for 10 minutes. 
 5. Check for uniform consistency and adjust if necessary by mixing further.
